trans-unit.source: Indicates which <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> a property is related to.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RelatedImageListAttribute"></xref> class.
The `relatedImageList` parameter can refer to a property of the current object, or a property of a property of the current object.
trans-unit.target: `relatedImageList`参数可以引用的属性的当前对象或当前对象的属性的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A> property set to a containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object, and the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> property, you could pass `"ListView.SmallImageList"` as the `relatedImageList` value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A>属性设置为包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>对象，并包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>对象具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>属性，您可以传递`"ListView.SmallImageList"`作为`relatedImageList`值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> the property relates to.
Gets the name of the related <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>
The RelatedImageList property can refer to a property of the current object, or a property of a property of the current object.
trans-unit.target: RelatedImageList 属性可以引用的属性的当前对象或当前对象的属性的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A> property set to a containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object, and the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> property, the RelatedImageList property would be set to `"ListView.SmallImageList"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A>属性设置为包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>对象，并包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>对象具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>属性，RelatedImageList 属性将设置为`"ListView.SmallImageList"`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>
